org.windyroad.jaha
Class Applet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  org.windyroad.jaha.Applet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public abstract class Applet
extends java.applet.Applet

Headless Applet. This class is deisnged to be used as a hidden applet on a web page. Communication between the page and the applet is achived via javascript. This allows the page to maintain a consitent look and feel, while leveraging the power of Java for program execution.

Author:
Tom Howard, windyroad.org
See Also:
Serialized Form
